title: 歐盟: 希望Joe Biden可以抗衡「中共」. Trump政府開始做既事, 希望Biden會繼續做.

replies.msg:
歐盟首席外交官Josep Borrell:

-歐盟期望可與Joe Biden合作抗衡中共.
-中共的不公平貿易手段, 以及在其他方面(例如 影響其他地區安全)所耍的手段, 都對歐洲構成大挑戰, .令歐洲非常擔憂.

- 連貫而有力的中國政策, 相信也合符美國兩黨共識.

- 老實說, Trump政府在上個月才開始跟歐盟商討如何合作抗衡中共.
- 期望Joe Biden會繼續跟歐盟合作, 抗衡中共.
- 歐盟已準備好! (We are ready)

https://eeas.europa.eu/headquarters/headquarters-homepage/88393/let%E2%80%99s-make-most-new-chapter-eu-us-relations_en

Let’s make the most of this new chapter in EU-US relations
09/11/2020 - 17:42
....
We can also foresee an interest by the incoming Biden administration for close cooperation on China and the challenges it poses in terms of unfair trade practices, security and other issues where we both have concerns. Formulating a coherent and robust China stance is at the top of the agenda in Washington and something on which there is bipartisan agreement. We are ready for that and we can expect the EU-US dialogue on China that we launched only last month to continue, with renewed energy, under the next administration.
...


Author
Josep Borrell, High Representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy / Vice-President of the European Commission
歐盟玩夾實

Josep Borrell在上月跟Mike Pompeo會面討論中國問題.

https://twitter.com/EUforYou/status/1321542763389816835

而家, 如果歐盟與美國可以合作, 未必輸比中共.

歐盟首席外交官Josep Borrell:

-歐盟期望可與Joe Biden合作抗衡中共.

https://eeas.europa.eu/headquarters/headquarters-homepage/88393/let%E2%80%99s-make-most-new-chapter-eu-us-relations_en

Let’s make the most of this new chapter in EU-US relations
09/11/2020 - 17:42
....
We can also foresee an interest by the incoming Biden administration for close cooperation on China and the challenges it poses in terms of unfair trade practices, security and other issues where we both have concerns. Formulating a coherent and robust China stance is at the top of the agenda in Washington and something on which there is bipartisan agreement. We are ready for that and we can expect the EU-US dialogue on China that we launched only last month to continue, with renewed energy, under the next administration.
...


Author
Josep Borrell, High Representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy / Vice-President of the European Commission
